mapper.insert: insert into base_metal ( pqr_info_id, material_spec, type_and_grade, p_no, gr_no, thickness, diameter, other, create_time, create_user, modify_time, modify_user ) values ( #{pqrInfoId}, #{materialSpec}, #{typeAndGrade}, #{pNo}, #{grNo}, #{thickness}, #{diameter}, #{other}, NOW(), 0, NOW(), 0 )
mapper.select: select IF(COUNT(*) = 1,1,0) from base_metal where pqr_info_id=#{pqrInfoId}
